Package edu.ncsu.csc216.packdoption.model.manager

Class PackDoptionManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.packdoption.model.manager.PackDoptionManager
public class PackDoptionManager extends Object
Maintains the data structures for the entire application. PackDoptionManager implements the Singleton Design Pattern.
Author:
Michael Pacheco, Dania Swelam
